history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />. You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER the airport
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER Forbes and Craig
TTS Okay, leaving from forbes-craig apartments. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER 2 P.M.
TTS Okay, travelling at 02:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Sure.

TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> I will pause after every step and give you time to write things down. <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 9 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 1 min to Forbes avenue at Craig St. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>

USER I call anyway, cuz I got the phone with us for a blue house and I saw he will come over to see master bath salts is an avocado. And I also the something to do before I love the functionality listen Community if it's easy to be in the bath bathroom if it'll ask them to fax it.
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER done

TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 28X <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Pittsburgh International airport lower level.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 2:27pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER done
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> This is route 2 of 4, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 9 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 1 min to Forbes avenue at Craig St. </prosody> </speak>
